# Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference:** MX-42984121172
* **Solicitation Number:** PRO23SO2_80929
* **Publication Date:** 2023-12-20
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-06 (Local Time: 14:00:00)
* **Amendment Date:** 2024-02-06

### Request for Abbreviated Proposal (RFAP)

The Department of National Defence, through Defence Construction Canada (DCC), is seeking consultant services for the implementation of a Standing Offer (SO) to provide Safety and Environmental Management System (SEMS) services. The standing offer will be valid for a period of three years.

### Services Required

* Performance and compliance audits and gap analysis related to safety and environmental management systems (SEMS)
* Development of Safety and Environmental Management System directives and Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)

### Tendering and Evaluation

Bidding and documents are available on the MERX website. The call for proposals will be evaluated using the criteria included in the RFAP documents.

### Security Requirements

The security requirements for this project are outlined in the RFAP documents. Proponents are expected to meet the necessary security requirements.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

* Evaluation of proposals will be based on the criteria specified in the RFAP documents
* Successful proponents will be required to meet the necessary security requirements

### Contract Award

The contract award will be announced on the DCC website.

### Submission Information

Proposals should be submitted electronically through the MERX bidding system. Please see the MERX website for more information on the tender and submission process.

### Contact Information

Sarah Montesano, Defence Construction Canada
Email: [sarah.montesano@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:sarah.montesano@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
Phone: 613-294-7162
